sentence.Network_en: I have had enough obloquy for one lifetime.
In the Xixi local police station office at Chen Mou to obloquy.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin obloquium 'contradiction', from Latin obloqui, from ob- 'against' + loqui 'speak'

means.word_mean: 1. state of disgrace resulting from public abuse
